Key Match Events: Lane Thomas knocked in Game 3's first run with a single through the right side.
Spencer Torkelson tied things up with a sacrifice fly into center field.
José Ramírez launched a go-ahead solo shot into the bullpens in left field.
Zach McKinstry hit a two-run homer off Beau Brieske into left field.
David Fry launched a season-altering two-run homer off Beau Brieske into left field.
Pre-Game Insights: The Tigers have already stood out as the Cinderella of the 2024 MLB postseason, and for good reason.
The Tigers had a chance to take the series in Detroit and punch a ticket to the ALCS.
Post-Match Reflections: The American League Division Series is going to a decisive fifth game.
The Yankees’ ALCS opponent will be decided on Saturday in Cleveland.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Josh Naylor and Thomas both singled in the third inning
Jake Rogers lined into a brutal inning-ending double play
